name: Soul (knh190, fengyz)
description:
Game!

Proc generated puzzle, sparkled by classic game Lights Out.

GMTK's theme is "Out of Control", where you have side effects clicking a cube, which affects all cubes that link to it as well. Click a cube to change its color, and align all cubes to the same color to clear level. When paired cubes are correctly aligned, you'll see a link established.

Control?

  • left click to change color
  • scroll to zoom camera
  • slider to change node distance

Credits

  • Harry＆Fengyz: code, ui
  • Rui＆Noki: art 
  • KHN190: code, design

Music

  • Crystal Skies - "Be Still"

Source Code

It's open sourced, licensed with MIT. The open source version doesn't include art works but only code. Click here to get the early prototype.
